description: Try our easy to follow Italian Chicken Rice Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Casserole,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tree nut free,Rice,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Italian Chicken Rice Bake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup medium grain white rice, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, flameproof casserole dish (16-cup capacity) over a medium heat. Add onion and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, until soft. Add chicken. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 6 minutes, or until browned.
Stir in rice and paste. Add Campbell’s Real Stock – Chicken and peas. Stir well to combine. Bring to boil. Cover with lid. Transfer to oven.
Cook for about 25 minutes, or until rice is just tender and liquid has almost been absorbed.
